acceptedContracts().details: The contact name listed in this method is also needed to be listed `requiredContracts` method.

addBorrowFutureValue(address,uint256,uin.details: Since the total supply can be determined by totaling only the amounts on one side of the order when the order is fulfilled, the total supply is incremented only when the executor of the original order is the taker.

params._isTaker: The boolean if the original order is created by a taker

addLendFutureValue(address,uint256,uint2.details: Since the total supply can be determined by totaling only the amounts on one side of the order when the order is fulfilled, the total supply is incremented only when the executor of the original order is the taker.

params._isTaker: The boolean if the original order is created by a taker

returns.maturity: The maturity of the market that the future value was added

returns._0: The boolean if the lending market is initialized or not

initialize(address).details: Function is invoked by the proxy contract when the contract is added to the ProxyController.

params._resolver: The address of the Address Resolver contract

returns.currentAmount: Current future value amount after update
returns.isAllRemoved: The boolean if the all future value amount in the selected maturity is removed

requiredContracts().details: The contract name list is in `./libraries/Contracts.sol`.

acceptedContracts().notice: Returns contract names that can call this contract.

addBorrowFutureValue(address,uint256,uin.notice: Adds the future value amount for borrowing deals.

addLendFutureValue(address,uint256,uint2.notice: Adds the future value amount for lending deals.

getFutureValue(address).notice: Gets the future value of the account.

hasFutureValueInPastMaturity(address,uin.notice: Gets if the account has the future value amount in the selected maturity.

removeFutureValue(address,uint256).notice: Remove all future values if there is an amount in the past maturity.

requiredContracts().notice: Returns the contract names used in this contract.

userdoc.notice: Implements the management of the future value as an amount for Lending deals in each currency.
